sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no mention of a granddaughter of Lord Walder Frey named "Neyela", nor for that matter are there any other Freys named "Neyela".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
NeyelaÂ is one of the many granddaughters of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[The Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure's]]Â [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
